title: Pakistan’s envoy-designate to UN in Geneva calls on PM
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 25 (APP): Pakistan’s Permanent Representative to the United Nations in Geneva Bilal Ahmed on Wednesday called on Caretaker Prime Minister Anwaar-ul-Haq Kakar here.
In the meeting, the prime minister expressed good wishes for the envoy-designate.
He also instructed the Pakistan’s Permanent Representative to effectively highlight Pakistan’s viewpoint at the United Nations’ platform.
